title: No guns at protests, Trump says. Your rights explained
shortDescription: Experts said advocates on all sides of the gun debate have found common ground in defending Alex Pretti for legally having a gun at the time of his death.

title: Trump travels to Iowa for speech focused on energy, economy
shortDescription: President Trump is scheduled to speak in Clive as he returns to Iowa for a second time in his second term ahead of the mid-term elections.

title: Trump comments on Homan and Pretti
shortDescription: President Trump commented on sending Tom Homan to Minnesota and some labeling Alex Pretti as a "domestic terrorist" at an Iowa event.

title: GOP candidate rips Republicans, drops out of Minnesota governor race
shortDescription: Chris Madel, who provided legal support to the ICE agent who fatally shot Renee Nicole Good, said federal operations in the city are 'wrong.'

title: Trump comments on Alex Pretti shooting
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said people can't "walk in with guns" as he responds to the shooting death of ICU nurse Alex Pretti.

title: ¿Cae Greg Bovino tras Minnesota? Trump ajusta su ofensiva migratoria
shortDescription: Greg Bovino fue removido de su cargo nacional tras un tiroteo mortal en Minnesota, reavivando dudas sobre el rumbo de la política migratoria de Trump.

title: Trump says Cabinet meetings are 'boring as hell'
shortDescription: President Trump explained why he sometimes closes his eyes during Cabinet meetings.

title: What to know about first lady Melania Trump as she promotes new doc
shortDescription: First lady Melania Trump has produced a documentary about the lead-up to 2025 inauguration. Here is what to know about her age, background and role.

title: Trump says Kristi Noem is staying put amid Minnesota reshuffling
shortDescription: President Trump said he still has confidence in Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem and won't ask her to step down from her position.

title: Trump attempts damage control in Minneapolis
shortDescription: The Trump administration tries different approach to immigration enforcement after two American citizens are killed in Minneapolis.

title: For Kristi Noem, an impeachment threat is growing
shortDescription: Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem is facing more calls for her impeachment or firing among Democrats than at any point in her tenure.

title: Trump returns to Iowa amid fears of 'impending ag crisis'
shortDescription: Trump comes back to Iowa where farmers have faced major headwinds during his second term, with corn and soybeans costs often outpacing prices.

title: 'Unify.' Melania Trump calls for peace in Minneapolis in rare statement
shortDescription: "I'm against the violence, so please, if you protest, protest in peace," the first lady said. "We need to unify."

title: Trump order seeks to fast track LA wildfire rebuilding, bypass permits
shortDescription: New Trump order pushes federal takeover of LA wildfire rebuilding, allowing permit bypass and launching a federal audit of California disaster spending.

title: Trump order seeks to fast track LA wildfire rebuilding, bypass permits
shortDescription: President Trump's order accelerates LA wildfire recovery, sparking conflict with California over management and permitting rules.

title: Texas Gov. joins wave of ICE skepticism from Republicans
shortDescription: Texas Gov. Greg Abbott remained supportive of ICE, but said the Trump administration needs "to recalibrate" its approach.

title: Trump admin sued over 2 deaths in boat strike off coast of Venezuela
shortDescription: Relatives of men killed in a strike on a suspected drug boat sued for wrongful death, alleging they were killed in an unlawful military campaign.

title: Fetterman asks Trump to fire DHS chief Kristi Noem
shortDescription: The Democratic lawmaker known for his independent voting record and willingness to work with the GOP slammed Noem as "betraying" the agency.

title: Trump raises tariff hikes on South Korea
shortDescription: President Donald Trump threatened to hike tariffs on South Korea, saying the country isn't living up to a trade agreement.

title: Trump says he closes eyes because of 'boring as hell' Cabinet meetings
shortDescription: President Trump offered a new explanation for closing his eyes and appearing to fall asleep during Cabinet meetings: They're boring.

title: Nicki Minaj set to speak at Trump event
shortDescription: Nicki Minaj is listed as one of several speakers set to appear at an upcoming Treasury Department event to discuss Trump Accounts.

title: Daily Briefing: Trump's immigration plan on thin ice?
shortDescription: Trump's immigration approval rating drops, poll finds. Here is the news to know on Tuesday.
